name: Eclipse (itch) (baltis)
description:
Controls
  • Arrow keys to move
  • Enter to interact
  • Hold shift to run while moving
Survey link

https://forms.gle/X8JVXQzvNkFuzAC28

Story

As the annual Olympiads Competition draws near, a group of ambitious students set out to prepare themselves for the ultimate test. They convene on campus late one night, fueled by their passion to succeed. At the helm of this overachieving squad is Marcus, an impassioned leader with a singular focus on emerging victorious.

As the night progresses, the group begins to feel the weight of their tireless efforts, and some members consider calling it a night. However, strange and unexplainable occurrences begin to unfold around the school building...

Will the team be able to overcome these obstacles and continue their quest for glory? Or will the unknown forces that haunt the campus put an end to their dreams of triumph?
